Articles.Content:
I finally got the time to upload these crafts, sorry for the wait.

First of, two rovers from ace of spades:

The SC-1, a sports car with all the bells and whistles of human cars, excluding safety. But who needs that?

The ATV-2, a more stable ATV...that could go to space. No guarantees here. It's simple, and totally not powered by hidden RTG's.

Next up, the ADC-001B, from Startreader. Its a defense airplane with 4 low-yield bomb and 2 buckshot torpedoes. Moderate performance and great for all your 'splosion needs.

If staging fails, 1 and 2 fires torpedos. 4 deploys emergency chutes.

Downloads:

SC-1:https://www.dropbox.com/s/os01akqdocmm4ca/Rover%20SC-1.craft

ATV-2: https://www.dropbox.com/s/rvrbjk4g8f4eopq/Rover%20ATV-2.craft

ADC-001B:https://www.dropbox.com/s/8wxj3ygurd0tfo9/ADC-001B.craft

Edited August 12, 2013 by Kerbol Prime
Oh, forgot that I sent you the ADC-001B, which means that the version I sent you recently would be the ADC-001C, woops my bad
